title: Football at the 2001 Mediterranean Games
text:
The 2001 Mediterranean Games football tournament was the 14th edition of the <a href="Football%20at%20the%20Mediterranean%20Games">Mediterranean Games men's football tournament</a>. The <a href="association%20football">football</a> tournament was held in <a href="Tunis">Tunis</a>, <a href="Tunisia">Tunisia</a> between 5 and 18 September 2001 as part of the <a href="2001%20Mediterranean%20Games">2001 Mediterranean Games</a> and was contested by 9 teams, all countries were represented by the U-21 teams. Tunisia won the gold medal.
Participating teams.
Nine teams for under-23 took part in the tournament, 4 teams from Africa and 5 teams from Europe.
